choices: Live Action TV Show/Live Action Movie
1.content:
The start of a new day. You turn your blaring alarm off, get up, and randomly check the mailbox outside. There's a package addressed to you... which is odd, because you didn't order anything. You go inside and open the package.

What's inside is a strange black box and a small book that seems to contain instructions. Reading them over, you have to admit it sounds unbelievable, but it seems simple enough to test. It says that if you put a picture of a fictional girl inside and close the lid, the box creates a figurine of the girl. Then there's a lot of other instructions, but testing the thing comes first.

Do you have any fictional girls in mind? If so, what piece of fiction are they from?
1.title: The Start

choices: To Aru Majutsu no Index/Kagaku no Railgun/Index II
11.title: Which one?

111.title: To Aru Majutsu no Index/Kagaku no Railgun/Index II

choices: "Would you make me as big as you?"
1112.content:
You figured Mikoto Misaka was as good a place to start as any. So, you went online, printed out a picture of Mikoto, and put it in the box and closed the lid. You waited three seconds, not sure if you wanted to know if it was real, and then opened the lid. Inside was a perfect, 3" tall figurine of Mikoto in a casual pose.

Referencing the instructions, you decided the next thing to do was to give it a command.

You removed the figurine, set it on the computer desk, and said, "Mikoto Misaka, grow three inches and maintain current proportions." The figurine grew to 6”, and then… started moving.

It yawned, stretched its arms over its head, and said something in Japanese, which you didn’t understand. Then it spotted you and clearly became afraid of the towering person looking at it with an expression of disbelief, although it… no, she did a pretty good job of covering it up and started shouting what it didn’t take a Japanese speaker to figure out was a string of threats.

“Mikoto Misaka, speak English,” you ordered simply.

“What the hell, you moron!?” Mikoto yelled at you. “There’s no way I can just speak English at the drop of a hat, you know!”

“You’re doing it right now,” you observed.’’

“Like I said, there’s no way that I… I… huh?” Mikoto trailed off as she became conscious of the words she was speaking. “I…”

“Look,” you said. “I don’t mean you any harm, and you’re powerless to resist even if I do. So would it be too much for you to ask to calm down and accept your fate?”

“Hell yeah it is!” Mikoto yelled. She started running at you, and then she made a flying leap off the desk right at you.

“Mikoto Misaka, hold current position,” you said while she was in the middle of her jump, and she froze in place – literally! She was suspended in the air, in blatant defiance of gravity. She looked around, and down, and realized she wasn’t going anywhere. “See?” you said.

“Would you let me down from here?” Mikoto asked meekly.

“Fine,” you said. “Mikoto Misaka, return to the table.” Mikoto immediately reversed her trajectory and returned to the edge of the desk. “Now, I basically have full power when it comes to you. Understand? So I want to know how you’d like your body changed, just so you can’t cry foul over my not asking.”

“Okay…” Mikoto thought.
1112.title: Mikoto

11121.content:
You smiled at how typical Mikoto's request was. Even in the anime, Mikoto was self-conscious about her cup size, which, while not small, was on the low end of normal. "Mikoto Misaka, grow to DD-cup," you said. Instantly, her breasts swelled to the size at which “melons” would be an appropriate metaphorical description. Mikoto looked down at them in interest and hefted them in her hands.

“Okay, now for my changes,” you said…
11121.title: "Make my breasts bigger."

113.content:
Entering in a rather vague search of "Anime girls" in Google, your screen quickly became covered with various well known animes. The amount of choices simply overwhelmed you at first as you shook your head in confusion.

"On second thought..." You said to yourself. "Maybe I should stick to a more narrowed down search...."

You didn't want to pick something that was so obscure that the box wouldn't register who it was, so it was best to choose an anime that was pretty well known. You caught a brief glance of Sakura from Naruto in the mountain of images in front of you. It seemed like a fair enough place to begin your searching.

You whispered what you retyped into the Google search out loud. "Naruto girls..."

Which girl would you eventually settle on?
113.title: Girls of Naruto.

1132.content:
There was a slight pause in your search when you came across a particular female ninja, a well known one at that. The image you had stumbled across was that of Hinata Hyuga, the shy black haired girl with a crush on the main character, Naruto.

Now unlike most guys who would probably jump at the chance to pick out the hottest babe in anime for their own perverted pleasures, you wanted to choose Hinata as a test subject for different reasons. You weren't going to fool yourself, you were very curious as to the powers behind the box and if they were true or not. But there was one big reason why you wanted to choose Hinata. You felt like she and you were relatable.

Everyone at one point in their life could base the craziness in their daily routines to a show or an anime. Admittedly, you probably wouldn't be a very good main character. You were quiet and often didn't like speaking unless you had something important to say, your parents have often considered you to be shy and you just sort of ran with it. Maybe you didn't stutter like Hinata did or get easily embarrassed, but you were definitely a very quiet person. Considering most of your friends were talkative and blabbly, you were usually the black sheep of the group. In a sense, you felt similar to Hinata but there was one key point in how both of you differed in terms of personality.

She had her heart set on someone.

The reason you had thought your life was relatable to a drama was because of after one particular case concerning a girl from school, Amelia. You didn't care much for girls, though your parents didn't think much of it. You were sixteen, there was still time to be dating, plenty of time in college you figured. But this one girl, Amelia...She struck you as different from everyone else. Sure, you had had crushes, most of them you were too chicken to do anything about. But you felt... different around Amelia. The last time you tried to do some deep thinking about the feeling you had for her, you ended up in tears in front of a YouTube Linkin Park music video... That was down-right embarrassing and you didn't want to try it again.

But you couldn't shake that one feeling. It was nagging you, even now which was months later. You couldn't talk to your friends about it, they all knew and talked to Amelia. If you discussed this sort of thing with them A.) You wouldn't hear the end of it, B.) They'd tell Amelia, and C.) The feeling might go away. If you talked with your parents, they'd probably tell you to stop being such a pussy and talk to the girl. It was strange, you wanted to have this feeling for her yet you didn't know what it was.

Which is why you wanted to test this on Hinata.

This shy little girl who seemed a lot like you. A miniature therapist. Another you who you could physically converse with. Maybe you were just crazy to even try something like this, maybe your parents were right and you were being too much of weakling about this. But you had a "magic box" that needed testing and questions that needed to be answered. And as is said about many of the greatest strides in humanity.

"Why the hell not?"
1132.title: Hinata, the shy ninja

11322.content:
If you were going to go through with this crazy plan, and you were, you were at least going to have to go with a Hinata who was more mature. Someone who was closer to your age and could maybe see things in a better light than a younger person could.

It was decided, you were going to bring to life a Hinata that was your age from Shippuden.

Narrowing your search on Google even further with the words "Hinata Shippuden", coming up with the perfect full body picture of her in her older form. Once you were satisfied, you printed it out and set it square folded in the small black box. Everything was in order, all you had to do was close the lid and wait.

You breathed in sharply as you opened the box not sure what you were going to find. It can as a relief when you discovered that the picture was gone and in its place was the most perfectly accurate three inch figure of Hinata Hyuga in an idle pose.

"Whoa..." You almost didn't expect it to work, a cruel joke placed on you by some strangers for a laugh.

But here she was, well a figurine of her anyway. Hinata the shy ninja, a character you could most relate to. Perhaps a stronger friend than any of your real friends at school, someone with answers for you in this crazy time of your life. The only problem was she didn't appear to be moving.

Confused, you took another look at the instructions. Apparently, you had to speak every specific command for the magic to work. You thanked god that you were in the privacy of your room with your parents out, else you might have been embarrassed for speaking such odd things aloud.

"Um, Hinata," you decided to start simple first. "Awaken."

You jolted in your seat as the tiny figurine's eyes suddenly blinked a few eyes and watched as the small toy rose from the bottom of the box and stretched. The Hinata figure looked around a bit and seemed confused judging by how she muttered to herself. Because she was so small, you couldn't really make out the words but somehow you detected they were Japanese. It made sense, considering the origin of the character.

You were going to have to fix that if you wanted to set things right. "Hinata, speak English please."

She suddenly took notice to you and looked up at your towering form, eyes widened. Hinata...
11322.title: Wake up call

113221.content:
What followed was a series of squeaks and cries resonating from inside the box. You still couldn't make out most of them, but you could tell they were definitely in English now and certainly sounded panicked. She stared up at you with big wide eyes and fell backwards right on her small bottom.

"Uh, Hinata, speak up please so I can hear you."

"-hat are y-you!? W-What do you want from me!? W-Why is everything so big!?"

You quickly decided that asking to hear her was a big mistake and covered your ears. "Hinata, please be quiet!"

Hinata's mouth was still moving but no words were coming out, she grabbed her throat in shock and looked more freaked out then ever. This was getting you absolutely no where fast. Slowly, but surely, you were understanding just how powerful this box was and how specific you were going to have to be with the commands. You decided to try your luck again.

"Okay, Hinata. Just calm down please. Stop. Don't freak out. Okay?"

The tiny girl took a deep breath and nodded her head. You sighed in relief. "Alright, now you can speak."

She was still trying to come to grips with what was going on, but at least now she didn't appear as frightened as she was before. Her first question was a simple one. "W-Who are you?"

"Who am I?" you repeated, not quite sure where to begin. "Um, my name is Nick. I'm just a normal sixteen year old."

"A-Are you a g-giant?"

"Me? Nah, I mean, I guess I am pretty tall for someone my age but I'm not a giant. I guess it doesn't feel that way considering how tall you are."

"W-what do you mean?"

"Yeah...I don't quite know how to explain this to you other than the basic facts because I'm not entirely sure how things work myself. For starters, I'm not a giant. You're just around three inches tall so I guess I do seem like a giant to you."

"Th-Three inches tall!?"

Thus began the long tedious process of explaining everything to the shrunken Hinata, well maybe not everything. You didn't want to explain to her why you 'summoned' her to your world, but you did want to at least give a vivid clarification to her so she'd calm down more, it didn't seem fair for you to keep using the commands against her. She didn't seem to keen on the idea of complete control over her either, she shuddered when you mentioned the rules.

"Y-You wouldn't abuse that power, would you N-Nick?"

You blushed at the thought of it, it had crossed your mind but deep down you weren't that kind of person. "Don't be silly, of course not."

She seemed a little bit more relieved now and relaxed as you answered the remainder of her questions including where she was, how she got there, how you knew her, and who you were. She seemed slightly interested in everything but was still clearly shaken. You reasoned that she probably still felt very small, using the power of the box you could probably up her height a little bit and get her to be more comfortable.

"Say, Hinata, would you want me to make you a little taller? I think with the box I can do that."

Hinata nodded quite calmly but you saw the eagerness in her face. So far she hadn't said much about herself, maybe if you rewarded her with a boost she'd open up a little more not that she was ever vocal in the Naruto series.

"Alrighty then, Hinata grow to..."
113221.title: Appropriate Response

125321.content:
Figuring Nick would try his luck, he quickly printed off a picture of Miranda Lawson from Mass effect 2 wearing her white suit and placed the picture into the black box before waiting.

If he was truthful Nick didn't know what was going to happen. Did the box make a noise when it created a figure like a microwave or did he have to know how long it would take for the box to make them and then remove it. It was all over his head, however after a five minute wait he decided to take a peek and slowly opening the lid of the box there he saw laying on it's back was a figure of Miranda Lawson in her white outfit from the mass effect 2 game.

Slowly he picked the figure up and looked at it. It was very well made and look quite real, even the figure face felt real. Still this was weird and so placing the Miranda figure on his computer table laying down with her arms beside her and her legs in stretched out in front. Nick then went back to the box to see if there was anything else he was suppose to do only then to hear a grunt coming from the table.

He quickly turn around with box in hand and to his surprise the Miranda figure got to her fee rubbing her head.

"Arr. Where am I?" Miranda said aloud thinking she had landed on some strange planet. It was then Nick slowly moved towards her catch her attention did she jump back before shouting.

"Stop right where you are!"

And at that Nick did. He was only a few centimetres away from her and to Miranda he looked to be a huge giant.

"As a officer of Cerberus I demand to know where and am and how I got here?" she says sounding as tough as she did in the games.

Nick didn't really know what to say, but he guess first he should say he comes in peace before beginning to explain about the box and how it works.

"I see." Miranda said taking it all in. "So you managed to create me in your world and now even through I retain my personality and clothes, you have powers to control me yes?"

Nick nodded realising how bad that made him sound. It was then Miranda asked him what he purpose was to do with the box?

"Tell me as a man with all that power, what do you plan to do with it?"

Nick however didn't really know how to answer after all he could use it the box for so many things.

He could create himself an army of video game women who could help him and perhaps the world or he could misuse it. After all, Nick wasn't thick and after his recent mess with relationships perhaps he could get what ever guy his age wanted without that. He could abuse the power and become a man of greed, lust and desire.

In the end Nick said to Miranda..

"I think you'd rather be back to your own height then be this small but I don't know so I want you to make that choice Miranda. Actually can I call you Mira? it seems more friendly" Nick says happily.

With the box in his hand he was thinking about what size he wanted her. Being small was fine and all but if she was her normal size think what she could do then? It was a choice with many different outcomes and risks, however in the end Nick choose to..

Next you:
14522.title: Harley Quin (The joker's side kick)

choices: Use the box to replace the Joker as her love interest
Change her appearance to Harley Quinn from the video game "Arkham City"
145221.content:
You take the figurine out of the box and set it in the middle of your desk.

While holding the box you say "Harley Quinn, grow until you are six inches tall."

The figurine expanded until it stood half a foot in height. The features of the figurine became more obvious. It was incredibly detailed and lifelike. Though obviously made of plastic, until the sheen disappeared and the plastic was replaced with skin and fabric.

She started moving, looking unsure and confused. Her head turned left and right.

"Mr. J?" She said her pet name for the Joker uncertainly. Next to her on your desk was a pencil nearly as long as she was tall, she had not see you yet. Something donned on her and she looked around at the giant sized desk and its contents. "What is this place."

Your heart pounded. The box worked! You could create copies of fictional women for your own pleasure.

"I can't believe it!" You exclaimed.

That caught her attention. She looked up at you and realized that she was being watched by a giant sized teenage boy. She screamed and toppled over.

She began crawling backwards across you desk and staring at you in wide eyed terror.

"Wh-who are you?" She stammered. "How did I get here? D-did you shrink me?" You were amused. You couldn't help but smile a little.

"Ya won't get away with this!" She yelled. Suddenly defiant. "Mr J will find out about this and he'll have the last laugh!"

"The Joker will not be coming for you." You said smugly. "He is not real and you aren't the real Harley Quinn."

"What are you talk'n about?" She said once again timid.

You pick up the box and show it to her.

"Harley Quinn and the Joker are fictional characters. I made you. You are a real life miniature copy of the character Harley Quinn that I made using this. I can also use this box to change you in any way I please!"

You . . . .
145221.title: Bring her to life and make her six inches tall.

14531.content:
Nick thought for a moment and decided to test the strange box out using the pictures of females from Teen Titans. He then printed out several pictures of them and set them on his desk

"Now which one should I use first?" he said out loud...
14531.title: Teen Titans

145312.content: How about Starfire or Raven?
145312.title: Someone else...

145332.content: How about the cartoon movie, Frozen?
145332.title: Frozen?

1453321.content: Which Princess do you prefer? Anna or Elsa?
1453321.title: Disney Frozen!

14533212.content: Will it be the queen version or the teenage princess before Elsa became the queen
14533212.title: Elsa

1453322.content: Because it was both a TV series as well, why not include character from both the movies and TV series here?
1453322.title: Aladdin series

14533221.content: Okay, next question heroine or villainess?
14533221.title: Aladdin

145332211.content: You ultimately decide on the top two choices either the beloved,beautiful and spunky Princess Jasmine or option B the real live witch of the sand(no pun intended) and street rat Sadrina which will it be though?
145332211.title: Hero (Jasmine, Sadrina, etc.)

choices: ...take a look at the next section of the instructions.
...notice she wasn't the only female figurine in the box.
1453322111.content: You browse the Internet and find some pictures of Jasmine on a wiki dedicated to Disney cartoons. You print one of the screenshots from the TV show off and put it in the box and close it thinking it was an experimental 3D Printer. You then give it a minute before sticking your hand in it and putting out a figurine of Princess Jasmine. You set it up on shelf among other toys you have including ones from Dreamworks Kung Fu Panda such Tigress, Po, and Shifu, Amiibos like Shulk, Fox, Sonic, Link, Zelda, Ness, Peach, Samus, Lucas, and Mewtwo, various Disney Infinity figures you have such as Mulan, Rocket, Venom, and some cubee papercrafts of various cartoon, movie, comic, and video game characters. Afterwards, you...
1453322111.title: Princess Jasmine

14533221111.content:
Nick picked up the box and read the instructions to himself.

"Speak her name and declare how you wish she might change. Your creation will come to life and be changed as you have wished."

Nick paused. Really? "Come to life?" As in, the little plastic figurine that he had just 3D printed would become a real woman and change to suit him? He scanned the rest of the instructions. The woman he created would have to obey his every instruction, and could do seemingly physically impossible things when ordered to. The box allowed the possessor to change the women it made, but it also said that they retained their normal personalities. The instructions never specified whether the box could change personalities.

Nick was tickled at the thought. What teenage boy would not want a beautiful woman at his beck and call? Though looking up at the shelf, he was a little skeptical that a small plastic figurine could be brought to life.

Nevertheless, Nick decided to give it a try.
14533221111.title: ...take a look at the next section of the instr...

145332211111.content: You decide to try and change her personality. What will you do?
145332211111.title: Attempt a personality change

1453322111111.content:
Nick had always had a deep seeded moral objection to slavery. To him, it seemed absurd that one human being could own another. . .but he was also a hormonal teenage boy eager to experiment. It seemed to him that slavery would not be so bad if the slave wanted to be owned. So he decided to try and make Jasmine want to be his property.

Of course, a more mature mind might still question the ethics of creating a human life just to own it. But, again, Nick was less concerned with ethics and more concerned with his own selfish desire to satisfy his own libido. He picked up the figurine and set it down on his desk.

Holding the box, he said "Princess Jasmine, will change to conform to my will. From this point forward, her only desires are to serve, please, and more importantly to obey me, her Master. She takes pleasure in being my property and is eager to serve."

The plastic sheen of the figurine disappeared as the figure came to life.

"It worked!" Nick thought. "She's alive!"

But has Nick's change worked?
1453322111111.title: Make her willfully obedient.

14533221111111.content:
The now living figurine opened her eyes and looked up at you admiringly. She knelt down on the desktop in a position of submission and spoke her first words.

"How may I serve you, my Master?"

You . . .
14533221111111.title: It worked! She's yours

145332211111112.content:
Nick decided to play with his new girl-toy properly. However, before doing so he hesitated. Looking again at the Disney Wiki Nick scrolled down to the vital statistics of his Disney Princess. Under the section "Age" he saw the number '16.'

Nick himself was a teenager. But, at 18 years old he thought it was a little creepy to have his magically created girl-toy be a minor. (Yes Nick, because having a magically created girl-toy that you specifically made to be obedient isn't creepy at all.) Nick decide to change her to suit his tastes.

He picked her up from her position on the desk. She did not struggle or try to resist only gracefully slid into his fingers. He set her down on the floor. Remembering that to change her, he must be holding the box he picked it up and made the change.

"Princess Jasmine, you will advance in age until you are physically 18 years old." He saw a slight maturing of her tiny features as her body accommodated his wish. "Now, you will . . "
145332211111112.title: Change her again.

1453322111111122.content:
"You will grow to full human size and your clothes will change into the red harem outfit that your character wore in climax of the first Aladdin film."

The tiny figurine sized woman began to expand, exceeding double her her original size very quickly. As she grew her clothes faded from blue to red and transformed into the red harem dress Jafar had forced her to wear in the movie. A golden crown sprouted from the jewelry on her head and she stopped growing at five feet and one inches tall. According to the Disney Wiki this was her height in the film. You are tall, around six feet in height. Her head was just under your nose.

She was the spitting image of the cartoon character. She once again knelt to you.

"Does this please you, Master?"

"Yes." You answer.

"How may I serve you?"
1453322111111122.title: Reader's choice

14533222.content: Have a Karan doll to play with
14533222.title: TMNT 2012

145332222.content: Why not? The DCAU is full of great female heroes and villains.
145332222.title: DC animated universe maybe

1453322221.content: And speaking of super, do you want Superman
1453322221.title: Super yes

14533222211.content: Now then, do you want the last daughter of Krypton?
14533222211.title: Superman: The Animated Series

145332222111.content:
Request From The Kong

To say your a lonely guy is quite an unfair judgement. It's not that your awkward around girls, in fact the opposite. They find you kind, charming and polite. It's just that you've never been very interested with the girls at your school. You are interested in girls, in fact you do have a kind of crush on a certain girl. The only problem is the fact that this girl isn't real.

It's Supergirl, more specifically the one from the Superman animated adventures. You don't know why but you always had a crush on her. Your favorite episodes were the one where she was featured on them.

Regardless you only had eyes for her, that's why you were a little excited when you were shopping last week. You ran into this weird stall at a festival which your at least 200% sure that person was a wizard. He even had a long grey beard. Anyway he offered you a box, and he said that 'anything I put in there comes to life'. At first I didn't believe him, but once he drew a picture and put it into the box, you were amazed at the fact that not only did it come alive, but it was a miniature figurine.

Needless to say, you bought the box.

So when you got home, you printed out one of the photos of Supergirl you had on your computer and placed it in the box. You brought it to your head and preyed.

"Please work, please come to life. Please work so I don't have to die alone" you prey.

You laid the box down on your table and slowly opened the box. Seeing if the box actually worked, or did he just pull one of the most elaborate sells in the game.

Opening the box you saw that inside of the box was a Supergirl ____________
145332222111.title: Supergirl's Fan

1453322221112.content:
You saw a tiny little doll of Supergirl. Not only that but she was around and moving. She looked at your giant face before saying.

"Who are you? where am I? where is Kal?" She asked a bit confused. You even smiled when you heard her voice. It sounded just like it did in the show. Your giddiness however didn't distract you as you noticed as Supergirl was walking out of the box, you back up quickly to give her room as the small figurine was leaving the box She stepped out of the. Box as she looked around. She noted that she was in some kind of room and that you were there.

"Ok, you better tell me where we are before I beat the answers out of you!" the small Heroine threatened. Your not really scared however since you highly doubt she's as strong as a Krytonian actual is. And the fact that she's so small makes you feel justified.

Your hubris seemed to be what caused your downfall because as soon as you thought that the weirdest thing happened. She started growing. Within seconds she was the size of a Barbie doll. In a few more she was baby size, a few more she was child sized. Then she was your size. And then she grew even bigger. It seemed to stop as she grew to ten feet. Leaving you face just in line with her underboob as she stands on the floor.

"Not Exactly Heat vision but I'll take it" Supergirl said to herself as he eyes locked on you. You quickly go to grab the box and although you do have it in your hands. Supergirl has you in hers. She swings you around and lifts you off the floor. Pinning you against the wall as she starts threatening you once again, this time making a fist so you would see she is serious.

"I'll ask you again, who are you? Where am I? And where is Kal?" she said slowly making sure you got her.

"Fine I'll tell you the truth..................... QUICK BOX. I wish Supergirl was _____________
1453322221112.title: Supergirl Is Confused and Angry

14533222211121.content:
"I wish Supergirl was madly in love with me" you say quickly. You see the box glow as it takes affect. And lucky you because Supergirl was just about to launch a punch in your face. You close your eyes expecting to get a fist in the face, however when you open your eyes you see Supergirl face not angry. Her beautiful face looked more loving and more happy.

"Hi" she says in a loving tone. Her eyes half open in love.

"Um, hi" you reply not really sure what to do now. However it seemed Supergirl did as she leaned forward and plated a big kiss on you. Her giant mouth over yours as she gives you a big and sloppy one.

She pulls her head back and brings you over towards your bed in the corner of the room. Carrying you over, she sits down on to the bed and places you on her legs, like how a mother might let her child sit.

"That was nice?" you could simply say almost hiding your Excitement. And the face Supergirl was giving you made you happy.

"I'm sorry I tried hurting you, I was just confused, after all being in place I couldn't recognize scared me, but seeing you hear made me feel okay." she said while she holds you close pushing the back of your head into her breasts and start rubbing and petting your head.

Kinda weird. "It's okay Supergirl"

"Please, just call me Kara" she said as you drop the box near the side of the bed. Excitingly preparing for what you thinks coming next.

More then just a dream come true, a once in a lifetime moment. The girl you loved was real and was in love with you, the fact that she's ten foot tall was just a bonus

What happens next?
14533222211121.title: Lovey Dovey Supergirl

145332222111211.content:
It happened so fast, Supergirl's mouth all over yours as you make out with her back, it never went past that however as you didn't get too frisky with her. After the make out session, you too slept together. Good thing your mother and your father was away on business, otherwise they could be freaking out that their son is sleeping with a random amazon girl. They left this morning (Friday) and will be back on Monday, meaning you have the entire weekend to spend with her.

You two woke up on Saturday morning. Her long arm hanging over you as she pulls you closer towards her chest. You've never snuggled with a girl before, especially a girl like Supergirl. The heat coming from her body radiated under the blanket.

Once she woke up giving you a big cuddle. You two got dress and went downstairs towards the kitchen, since you don't have Supergirl's clothes that are her size, you might have to shrink her down. But you kind of like her that size.

You get cooking, making pancakes in a pan for both you and Supergirl. She was waiting at the table for you, giving you a loving smile as you smile back at her. You brought the stacks of pancakes and you two start eating, although the amount of pancakes you two ate were vastly different. She's only a couple more feet, yet she's eating as if she was fifty foot tall.

Once she finished you got ready for a day on the town with your new girlfriend. You don't want to say it is so you can show off your girlfriend to everyone, but thats the main reason. Although Supergirl doesn't really feel like going into town, instead she wanted to go somewhere else more secluded. So it's just you two there.

What do you do, go into town or go somewhere more isolated.
145332222111211.title: Night With Supergirl

1453322221112111.content:
It seems Supergirl's idea actually persuaded you as you agreed with her. You know a nice little spot in the forest where you and your friends alway used to go to. You and Kara both got inside you small little car and started driving. Unfortunately for Kara, her ten foot frame couldn't really fit into your car, which caused you to grab the box from before and shrink her down to 5 foot 9, a more normal height. It didn't take long for you two to make it towards the forest, you kept driving through the foliage until you went off road. Taking a path many people don't know about. You kept driving until you arrived at where you wanted.

A small little watering hole with a waterfall ahead, surrounding beautiful trees all around you.

"Wow, this place is so beautiful" Kara said as she got out of the car to look at the scenery. You follow Suit as well, but instead of staring around, you took off your shoes and your t-shirt, you then dived into the water, you swim out as you invite Kara to come in as well.

Kara went into the car for a second which confused you, however she did get a running jump and hopped into the water afterwards. She created a splash as she moved her wet hair out of her face. Her only pair of clothes were wet. She swam over towards you and start making you out once again, which you gladly did. This time it was different considering that you and her were around the same size. However that wouldn't stayed like that for long as Kara brought her hand out of the water to reveal she was carrying the box.

"I wish I would grow" she whispered into the box. You feel her grow this time as she hugs you, you get taken out of the water as Supergirl grows and grows.

How big does she grow?
1453322221112111.title: Into The Woods With Supergirl

14533222212.content: How about Batman: The Animated Series?
14533222212.title: Another DCAU series

145332222122.content: What about Justice League the animated series?

1453322222.title: Super no

info.brief_description: You get a box that allows you to create, control, and bring to life fictional girls.
info.description:
Your name is Nick. One day, you get a weird black box in the mail. If you put a picture of a fictional girl inside, and then open it, you get a completely lifelike figurine of that fictional girl. If you speak the name of that fictional girl and a change you want to happen to them, they come to life, and the change happens to them. While alive, they must do what you say IF you insist upon it. They retain their personalities, but they also have to obey your every order (eventually, unless you specify a time, such as “Now”).

No killing Nick off or ending the story.

The box is six inches by six inches by four inches. Any figurines created will fit within the box.

Nick must be holding the box to make changes to girls, but not necessarily to command them. Any girl brought to life by the box cannot touch the box, although they may try.

The box’s changing power works on naturally real girls too, but you cannot control them like you can fictional girls unless you could control them anyway. (Fat chance of that.) The subject's clothes change with them, so they can't rip.

If you put multiple pictures of girls inside, the box creates one figurine for each. If you put multiple pictures of the same girl inside, the box creates one figurine. If you put pictures of different versions of girls inside (like Esper Form Terra and Normal Terra), they do not respond to their name unless you specify the version first.

The change happens even if it would normally be impossible for them to survive it. For instance, you could say “Mikoto Misaka, expose your heart”, and she would rip her chest open to show you her still-beating heart, and she would be none the worse off for it. (Not that you’d want to see her heart.) The command system is very metaphor/sarcasm-sensitive, so telling a girl to “spill her guts” does not necessarily translate into seppuku, and telling her to turn her shirt inside out and sing while dancing on one foot does not register if it’s said sarcastically. (Code Geass R2 reference there.)

Similarly, you could say "Kazumi Yoshida, lift the desk" while she's just a foot high and she'd do it, even though it would normally be impossible for her on account of both her size and her frailty.

The main character is as follows:
-Nick’s appearance: He’s tall and has short black hair. His skin is somewhere between tan and pale, and he tends to wear casual wear (aside from pocket T’s.) His favorite shirt is a gray one that states, “A clear conscience is the sign of a bad memory”.
-Nick’s personality: Nick tends not to talk much. When he does talk, he’s often concise, that is to say, short and to the point. He’s very observant and intelligent, and will often make observations that surprise people. He’s more of a foul-weather friend than anything – he dislikes social gatherings, but likes to help out. He likes anime and video games. He likes Amelia but doesn’t know he likes her, however he is perfectly aware that Amelia likes him. The one time he tried to dig up feelings for her, he ended up watching Linkin Park OMVs on Youtube until he cried, and then going to bed early.

Other characters:
-Amelia: Amelia is pale-skinned, with long black hair, an unimpressive figure, and a slight frame. (She’s not goth, she just looks like she is.) As for her personality, she’s cynical, sarcastic, somewhat spiteful, and often rude. She has a crush on Nick, but doesn’t know it, but she knows Nick well enough to know that he likes her. The one time she tried to dig up feelings for Nick, she ended up getting extremely confused, watching Linkin Park OMVs on YouTube until she cried, and then going to bed early. (This is ironic for obvious reasons.)

I reserve the right to update, delete, or add rules as I see fit. I also reserve the right to alter or delete chapters as I see fit. I do not hold grudges so do not worry that I will delete a well-written chapter simply because I don’t like the writer.
